Package assignment6.chatRoomApp

Class ProtocolHandler

java.lang.Object
assignment6.chatRoomApp.ProtocolHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
ChatRoomProtocol
public class ProtocolHandler extends Object implements ChatRoomProtocol
The ProtocolHandler class represents the frame data handler and is implemented form the ChatRoomProtocol interface

  • Field Summary
